founders.name: Laxmi Prasad Prasai
founders.message: Laxmi Prasad Prasai is a leading real estate investor and developer with an extensive and robust portfolio across Nepal. He is a strategic equity planner with significant investments in the hospitality and infrastructure sectors. In addition to his contributions to the private sector, Mr. Prasai has collaborated with the Government of Nepal, gaining valuable experience in policy development and public-sector planning. He has also been actively involved in various social service sectors, contributing to community development and social welfare initiatives.

founders.name: Shankar Bahadur Ghimire
founders.message: Shankar Bahadur Ghimire is an entrepreneur and investment expert with vast experience in insurance, equity, and hydropower. He has raised equity for 30+ companies and leads major firms like Fundrise Investment, TenX Hydro, Mero Beema, Saarathi Equity Fund, and Himalayan Energy, driving growth in Nepal’s finance and renewable energy sectors.

founders.name: Laxmi Bhattarai
founders.message: Mr. Bhattarai is an experienced energy sector leader, serving as MD of Garjang Upatyaka Hydropower (2.83 MW), CEO of Himalayan Energy (3 MW), and Director of Asian Batteries Ltd. He also advises multiple renewable energy firms, including Himalayan Solar (10 MW) and Snowfall Hydropower (29 MW), bringing 15+ years of expertise in leadership, governance, and sustainable growth. Laxmi Bhattarai

founders.name: Er.Lilamani Pathak
founders.message: Er. Lilamani Pathak is a seasoned hydropower professional, currently serving as Chairman of Himalayan Energy Pvt. Ltd., Managing Director of Rising Hydropower Company Pvt. Ltd., and CEO of South Asia Engineering Pvt. Ltd. He is also a Board Director at Ridi Power Ltd. With decades of experience, he has led the design and execution of major hydropower, solar, and infrastructure projects across Nepal. Lilamani Pathak
